sense.def:
Če človek
cites something
, nekaj navede ali omeni, zlasti kot primer ali dokaz tistega, o čemer govori.

seg.quote: Low wages were cited as the main cause for dissatisfaction.
The most commonly cited example of a primitive device is the abacus.

sense.def:
To cite someone or something in a legal action
pomeni nekoga uradno omeniti.
